Reviews.Content: ive stayed travelodge hotels regard chain excellent terms value money probably shock walked front door establishment reception common looked grotty smelled uninviting peeling paintwork tatty carpet tiles exposed wires piping warned partner didnt arrive 10pm car choice check reasonable nights rest wouldnt care oh dear oh dear start called family booked smelled cigarettes sorry smelled reeked accurate 1970s needless else shabby sorry shabby grubby stained flakey cracked mouldy threadbare broken dont bother complain stay night sent reception change explained left didnt smell cigarettes musty described merely due age offer air freshener kept conveniently hand counter compensation declined offer sprayed liberal amount perfume avail resigned note unable obtain change vending machine dial food delivery drink hotel situated near conveniences precluded travelling foot thin walls floors werent suffering couldnt bath shower dirty television broken obviously stained duvet mattress didnt help unlikely attempts romance partner feel generous giving star oh marginal didnt sleep rough
